name: Italy
visaRequirements: Schengen Visa required for most non-EU citizens

about.description: Italy is a country in Southern Europe known for its rich history, art, culture, and cuisine. From the ancient ruins of Rome to the Renaissance art of Florence and the romantic canals of Venice, Italy offers a diverse range of experiences.
highlights: Home to more UNESCO World Heritage Sites than any other country

attractions.name: Colosseum
attractions.description: The largest ancient amphitheater ever built, dating back to 70-80 AD.

attractions.name: Venice Canals
attractions.description: A network of canals that form the main transportation routes in this unique city.

attractions.name: Leaning Tower of Pisa
attractions.description: A famous bell tower known for its unintended tilt.

cuisine.name: Pizza Margherita
cuisine.description: Traditional Neapolitan pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.

cuisine.name: Pasta Carbonara
cuisine.description: Classic Roman pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

cuisine.name: Gelato
cuisine.description: Italian-style ice cream known for its rich flavor and smooth texture.

culturalNotes: Many shops close for siesta in the afternoon
Tipping is not mandatory but appreciated
